# actor.builds.list

## Description
Lists all builds of the project associated with the token used. Can be filtered by tags in the query string.

## Code Examples

<CodeGroup title='Request' tag='GET' label='https://api.tivet.gg/builds'>

```bash {{ "title": "cURL" }}
curl -X GET 'https://api.tivet.gg/builds'
```

```ts
// Create Tivet client
import { TivetClient } from '@tivet-gg/api';
const TIVET = new TivetClient({ token: '[YOUR TOKEN HERE]' });

// Make request
await TIVET.actor.builds.list({
  // Add your request body here
});
```
